thread.title_full: Series’ sequel ‘Harry Potter and the Cursed Child’ set 19 years after the last book

title: Series’ sequel ‘Harry Potter and the Cursed Child’ set 19 years after the last book
text: Series’ sequel ‘Harry Potter and the Cursed Child’ set 19 years after the last book Saturday, 24 October 2015 (12 minutes ago) "Harry Potter and the Cursed Child" will be a sequel to the original series and set 19 years after the end of "Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows". Harry Potter grows up in a new original play, 'Harry Potter and the Cursed Child.' As Leigh Scheps (@LeighTVReporter) explains, it's the first official Harry Potter story to be presented on stage. Recent related news "Harry Potter and the Cursed Child" will be a sequel to the original series and set 19 years after the end of "Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows".
